name: Twisting words around
description:
Words can be hurtful (specially in the tutorial).

This bullet hell x Where's Waldo game compensates its dark narrative themes of abuse (and thrive) with clumsy physics and the dumb idea of using words as enemies.

As the protagonist, you'll have to find your lost agency and capacities to thrive against your abusive SO.

Good luck and keep trying!

TW (trigger warnings): psychological abuse, sexual violence, gaslighting.

Made by Pablo Brusint as a submission for the Global Game Jam 2021.
